response.overview: In a small town along Route 7 in Akita Prefecture, Yong-ho decides to close down the pachinko parlour he and his mother Kyung-ja have run for 50 years, and invites his mother on an overseas trip to celebrate her retirement. On the journey south along National Highway 7, Yong-ho realises his mother's feelings for him. After the trip, Yong-ho finds a letter from North Korea addressed to his mother. Then his divorced daughter Nana, who has been living apart from him, suddenly comes to visit. Together with her daughter, who shows interest in the letter from North Korea, Yong Ho sets off on a journey northwards along South Korea's National Highway 7.
response.title: 国道７号線
